name: paintless - Firefox multiple row tab browser
description:
Firefox

version 0.0.6


--[description]

Change default chrome tab browser into an overflow scrollbox, with vertical scrolling.

Confirmed Working In:
Firefox 2.* , Firefox 3.0.* , Firefox 3.6.*

Confirmed Extension Compatibility:
Faviconize Tab , PageStyle2Tab


--[series]

The "paintless" series is a collection of styles meant to be styled over.  Alone, they clean the target page(s), preparing them for further styling with hopefully the least possible selector specificity.

Writing your style to overlay this one will save you from having to include this code version in yours.  Users can load both, and they'll get my updates without needing you to notice the update.  Write your style correctly, and my updates shouldn't damage your styles.  Instruct your style users properly, and perhaps they won't be annoyed at the extra clicking.


--[relevant]

See also:
style 2647
